tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sujoy discussed the medical condition of my kid in details and also told why doing certain tests would be essential. He listens to what you have to say patiently before providing his inputs. Is very helpful and available on phone for in case of any issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Today I visited him for my son ailment. He very patiently listens and then explains, which is rare. He also mentions clearly the dosage etc. Fine experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is very helpful and friendly.  Even let me contact him personally for my baby's  further issues. I am very satisfied.  I wanna thanx him a lot.
very polite. nice treatment. I am very happy that of that treatment. he constantly track and monitor from outside the city also.
